quote: The future when it comes, is just like the present. The present is all you have and the opportunity of the present is worth more than the success of the past or the promise of the future.
quote_letters: THE FUTURE WHEN IT COMES IS JUST LIKE THE PRESENT THE PRESENT IS ALL YOU HAVE AND THE OPPORTUNITY OF THE PRESENT IS WORTH MORE THAN THE SUCCESS OF THE PAST OR THE PROMISE OF THE FUTURE
